resources.string: PkRunner 2020 takes place in the fictional world of System Seven, where human consciousness is uploaded into a super computer known as HAL. Most in the digital world are unaware of their reality. Pk, the player character, has taken it upon himself to make it to the deepest levels of the program in order to destory HAL. In the bottom left screen will be have left and right arrows for PK to move left or right and in the right bottom screen will be an up arrow helping PK to move up. In addition, I want to thank Mannyboy who develop the game, Otis who made the music, and Adrian who design the UI for the game.
